}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:24.519
    | text      = But it's like there's, you know, have you ever picked up the phone and somebody was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:29.080
    | text      = on the other line?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:30.360
    | text      = It's so weird and disconcerting, but there's a billion people making a phone call at any
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:34.600
    | text      = given point in time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:35.679
    | text      = Somebody has to do it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:36.679
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, for sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:37.679
    | text      = It's possible, and it happens.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:38.679
    | text      = You ascribe significance to it where there may not be a significance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:41.960
    | text      = Yeah, it's just weird.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:43.159
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:44.159
    | text      = Though they didn't steal anything from that convenience store, the bombers did hijack
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:47.460
    | text      = a guy's SUV less than an hour later at 11.20pm, holding the driver hostage with them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:53.360
    | text      = They would go to a gas station where the younger bomber is caught on security cameras shopping
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:57.659
    | text      = for a bunch of snacks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:59.259
    | text      = He would later tell detectives that their plan was to drive to New York and set off
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:02.519
    | text      = another bomb there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:04.120
    | text      = This plan would be derailed by the SUV's owner escaping the car and running to a different
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:08.000
    | text      = nearby convenience store where he would call the police.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:11.179
    | text      = You can easily find security camera footage of the driver running into that store terrified,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:15.700
    | text      = hiding behind the counter and calling the police, telling them that he'd been carjacked
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:19.240
    | text      = by men claiming to be the bombers and that his car had a GPS system that they could track.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:24.279
    | text      = You can also easily find footage from the same time of the older bomber coming into
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:28.039
    | text      = the gas station to tell the younger brother that the driver had escaped and it was time
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:32.340
    | text      = to go.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:33.500
    | text      = The younger guy drops all his snacks and they run out back to the car to leave.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:38.600
    | text      = Later in this episode, Alex and a caller will discuss how the bombers were in a Mercedes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:43.600
    | text      = and how that's really suspicious.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:45.759
    | text      = They're trying to speculate about how did they get this money.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:49.080
    | text      = They were driving a Mercedes because they stole it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:51.340
    | text      = They stole it from this guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:52.340
    | text      = It was this SUV that they stole.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:53.899
    | text      = So what's the one lesson we can learn from the Boston bombing?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:57.039
    | text      = It's steal an older car.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:58.879
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:59.879
    | text      = I don't know if that's the lesson.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:00.879
    | text      = Are you sure?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:01.879
    | text      = I'm pretty sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:02.879
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:03.879
    | text      = The police track that SUV to an address in Watertown and units are dispatched.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:07.220
    | text      = The first responding officer spots the vehicle but is told not to engage until his supervisor
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:11.320
    | text      = arrives.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:12.320
    | text      = He follows the SUV.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:13.500
    | text      = Then around 12.41 a.m. the driver of the SUV gets out, approaches his car and starts shooting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:18.860
    | text      = The shootout lasts approximately eight minutes with both sides exchanging gunfire and one
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:22.840
    | text      = of the bombers throwing IEDs at the police, which Alex will later misidentify as grenades.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:30.559
    | text      = He does that in order to say like, how would they get their hands on grenades?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:33.639
    | text      = Those are super hard to get.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:35.240
    | text      = They didn't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:36.240
    | text      = They made IEDs, which is well within the range of their proven capabilities.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:40.759
    | text      = It's like their thing, honestly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:42.960
    | text      = At 12.49 a.m. the older brother is tackled by police after he appears to have run out
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:47.279
    | text      = of bullets.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:48.399
    | text      = The officers attempted to get him subdued and in custody, but while they were getting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:51.720
    | text      = him handcuffed, the other bomber drives right at them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:54.779
    | text      = The officers manage to jump out of the way, but the older bomber is run over as his partner
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:59.039
    | text      = escapes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:00.240
    | text      = So just before 1 a.m. the shootout in Watertown had come to an end.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:04.559
    | text      = The older bomber is taken to the hospital where he's pronounced dead.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:08.279
    | text      = They run his fingerprints and learn that his name is Tamerlan Tsarnaev and with this information
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:12.240
    | text      = they're able to identify his partner, his younger brother Johar.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:16.320
    | text      = Neutralizing one suspect is probably a good thing, all things considered, but it would
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:19.799
    | text      = be hard to consider this night's events a good result.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:23.159
    | text      = One officer had been severely injured and another had sustained injuries that would
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:26.440
    | text      = end up killing him approximately a year later.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:29.080
    | text      = Though one suspect was down, police were unsuccessful in giving chase to Johar, who disappeared
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:34.960
    | text      = into the night on foot after abandoning his vehicle about half a mile from the site of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:39.000
    | text      = the shootout.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:40.600
    | text      = Police went to work immediately, attempting to establish a perimeter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:44.200
    | text      = All points bulletins were sent out and bomb squads were called in to neutralize the unexploded
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:48.519
    | text      = IEDs that the brothers had left at the scene in Watertown.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:52.240
    | text      = News of the flare-up broke real quick and almost immediately the Watertown Police Department
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:56.639
    | text      = is inundated with tons of reports of suspicious individuals, all of whom they look into and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:01.720
    | text      = find unrelated to the search for Johar.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:04.480
    | text      = In this 24-hour span the department receives over 500 calls to 911, as opposed to their
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:09.480
    | text      = normal daily average of 30.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:11.720
    | text      = These people were dealing with an overwhelming situation where a community that had been
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:15.120
    | text      = on edge for days was now looking to them to protect them from a rogue individual on the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:19.399
    | text      = loose.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:20.840
    | text      = And it's easy to look at the situation and say that this was just one young man on the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:24.480
    | text      = loose.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:25.480
    | text      = What's the need for such a panic?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:26.919
    | text      = Why do you need such a massive police response, as we're going to end up seeing?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:31.019
    | text      = And I can see why someone would have that knee-jerk reaction, but the reality is not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:34.279
    | text      = so simple.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:35.639
    | text      = At the time it was very unclear if this was just one kid on his own that they were after.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:40.879
    | text      = For one thing, this was a kid who had bombed the Boston Marathon, who had been involved
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:44.720
    | text      = in the murder of a police officer, and when confronted by additional cops, he responded
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:48.799
    | text      = by throwing IEDs at them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:50.840
    | text      = This is a person who -
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:51.840
    | text      = And he killed his brother.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:53.360
    | text      = Well, yeah, maybe not intentionally, but -
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:55.519
    | text      = Not intentionally, but he did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:56.519
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:57.519
    | text      = He just did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:58.519
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:59.519
    | text      = Which is like a, you know -
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:00.519
    | text      = From my understanding, it's kind of up in the air about whether or not he would have
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:03.919
    | text      = died anyway.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:04.919
    | text      = He'd been -
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:05.919
    | text      = For sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:06.919
    | text      = Like, Chamberlain had been shot a bunch of times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:07.919
    | text      = For sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:08.919
    | text      = Yeah, but whatever the case, like, you don't know what this dude is capable of.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:11.799
    | text      = Exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:12.799
    | text      = He could be one guy on the loose, but that guy could have a cache of bombs, and every
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:16.840
    | text      = minute that he's on the loose, that could be the minute that a hospital or a T station
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:20.639
    | text      = is blown up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:21.639
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:22.639
    | text      = Or he could be, you know, if you see a big thing like the Boston bombing, there's no
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:27.440
    | text      = way that you're going to think, oh, it's just two lone people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:31.480
    | text      = There has to be some sort of connection to some sort of network.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:34.080
    | text      = How did they get all this information?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:35.799
    | text      = All that shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:36.799
    | text      = You can't rule that out until you have any information on it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:39.399
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:40.399
    | text      = And, yeah, it was a bit up in the air at that point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:42.159
    | text      = Exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:43.159
    | text      = And you can't let him - if he has accomplices, you cannot allow him to regroup.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:47.960
    | text      = Absolutely not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:48.960
    | text      = You can't let this person get back to whatever cell, for lack of a better term.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:54.279
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:55.279
    | text      = If there was one, which we know now there wasn't, but that's not the point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:58.000
    | text      = You didn't know that then.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:59.379
    | text      = The risk that could come from that is intense, and if you're able to catch the person before
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:04.720
    | text      = they're able to regroup, there's a possibility of disrupting the larger cell.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:08.319
    | text      = If there is one, there's a lot of reasons why you would need to treat this as if it's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:14.000
    | text      = a possible worst-case scenario, because the worst-case scenario is terrible.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:19.240
    | text      = So at 1.57 a.m., the Watertown PD sends out an emergency message to the residents of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:23.799
    | text      = town asking them to stay inside their homes and report anything that might be helpful
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:28.079
    | text      = in their manhunt.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:29.480
    | text      = This obviously is a very scary development, but honestly, given the circumstances, I'm
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:33.400
    | text      = not sure there was a good option.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:35.559
    | text      = And an important distinction needs to be made.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:37.779
    | text      = At this point, the message to stay indoors was not a mandatory order, and it was very
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:42.400
    | text      = localized to the area directly surrounding the morning shootout.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:46.400
    | text      = People could go outside if they wanted to, but they also ran a very high likelihood of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:49.960
    | text      = a neighbor seeing them and they're wandering around at 2 a.m.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:54.160
    | text      = What are they doing out there?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:55.640
    | text      = That's suspicious to a neighbor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:57.640
    | text      = 911!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:58.640
    | text      = This happened to at least one person mentioned in the police report who was questioned and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:02.400
    | text      = released, so it's not like the police had a standing order that you'd be shot if you
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:05.859
    | text      = went outside, which is kind of what Alex would like you to think.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:08.759
    | text      = Right, right, right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:09.759
    | text      = They set up turrets around every checkpoint and there are sniper people walking down the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:13.960
    | text      = street.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:14.960
    | text      = Nonsense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:15.960
    | text      = By 2.30 a.m., a unified command center is set up outside Arsenal Mall, an outlet shopping
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:20.279
    | text      = center in Watertown.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:21.920
    | text      = The center serves as a hub for coordination between Watertown PD, neighboring area police
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:26.319
    | text      = departments who have come in to help, as well as the FBI and the Massachusetts Emergency
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:30.420
    | text      = Management Agency.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:32.259
    | text      = Over 1,000 individual law enforcement officers are on hand to deal with the crisis, and by
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:36.799
    | text      = the end of the day, more than 2,500 officers will have been involved in some capacity in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:42.319
    | text      = the situation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:44.079
    | text      = At 4.15 a.m., the Massachusetts Emergency Management Agency and Governor Deval Patrick
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:48.599
    | text      = authorized the Massachusetts National Guard to deploy armed military police into Watertown.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:54.259
    | text      = This is another important distinction here because the authorization didn't come from
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:57.920
    | text      = FEMA or the federal government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:00.019
    | text      = This was a state-level decision, which really punches holes in any kind of states' rights
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:04.740
    | text      = anti-government angle to this response because that's well within the governor's mandate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:08.880
    | text      = They can call out National Guard for emergency situations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:12.000
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:13.000
    | text      = If this had happened in Texas, the Texas governor could also have not called in the National
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:17.480
    | text      = Guard.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:18.480
    | text      = It is up to them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:19.480
    | text      = More likely would not have.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:20.480
    | text      = Exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:21.480
    | text      = It would have been out there with a fucking group of vigilantes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:24.799
    | text      = Right, the discussion of whether or not it's the right decision or the most efficient decision
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:30.920
    | text      = is not really my interest.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:34.440
    | text      = The point is it was a state decision, which all the arguments about this being the federal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:39.640
    | text      = government coming in, it's absolutely not true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:42.559
    | text      = As the morning comes, 120 military police officers are sent out to assist local authorities
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:47.599
    | text      = in house-to-house searches, which have been authorized, again, by the proper channels.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:52.359
    | text      = At 5.15 a.m., the governor of Massachusetts and the mayor of Boston have a conference
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:56.500
    | text      = call with the Unified Command Center and decide they need to suspend mass transit services
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:00.980
    | text      = temporarily and put out a shelter-in-place request, effectively putting the area into
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:05.960
    | text      = lockdown.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:07.319
    | text      = This is the closest thing to martial law, as we've seen in the United States for a long
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:10.720
    | text      = time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:12.019
    | text      = It would be easy to see this as the fulfillment of Alex's prophecies, but it wasn't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:17.599
    | text      = This was a very severe but probably necessary law enforcement action, because what if Johar
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:22.720
    | text      = had been part of a larger cell?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:24.359
    | text      = Or what if he wasn't, but him being on the loose led to him bombing a train the next
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:27.960
    | text      = morning?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:28.960
    | text      = The worst-case scenario of not doing whatever needed to be done to catch him that night
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:32.319
    | text      = would be an unacceptable risk to take, and it would have been negligent of the police
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:36.380
    | text      = to not do this how they did, or at least that's my position on it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:40.440
    | text      = And it seems like the residents of Boston agree.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:42.960
    | text      = WBUR did a survey a year later in April 2014 and found that 83% of respondents believed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:49.920
    | text      = that the police putting out a shelter-in-place request was the right decision.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:54.920
    | text      = That support is crazy high.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:56.960
    | text      = That's ridiculous.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:57.960
    | text      = In the United States, you would have expected 50% to be like, why didn't we all get bombed?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:03.440
    | text      = Fine, whatever.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:04.640
    | text      = And that number crossed party lines, too, which is crazy interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:10.000
    | text      = So it seems like the people who are most affected by this agree that it was like the police
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:15.400
    | text      = acted appropriately.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:16.400
    | text      = Yeah, I can see an argument against it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:19.720
    | text      = I can understand that conversation, but it can only be had in hindsight.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:23.819
    | text      = And so we can apply some of those lessons to maybe future circumstances.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:27.819
    | text      = But I think no one involved acted in bad faith in any way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:32.640
    | text      = Which is why probably so many people agree that it was a good idea, because everybody
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:36.759
    | text      = was really trying to do good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:39.039
    | text      = Which is rare, especially from the cops.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:42.319
    | text      = If you read the after-action report that the authorities all collaborated on and put out,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:47.640
    | text      = there is a lot of very valid criticism, particularly about weapon discipline.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:55.480
    | text      = Particularly in the case of the Watertown shootout, when they were trying to stop Johar's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:59.680
    | text      = car leaving, trying to shoot out the wheels or whatever, they ended up creating a lot
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:03.920
    | text      = of crossfire possibilities.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:06.680
    | text      = There are circumstances like that that the police definitely didn't operate how they
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:12.000
    | text      = should have, but at the same time, they weren't doing it because they were trying to fuck
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:17.400
    | text      = around.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:18.400
    | text      = Yeah, exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:19.400
    | text      = It's more an instance of, like, we need better training so they know not to create possible
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:26.500
    | text      = risk situations like this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:28.079
    | text      = I want them to learn from this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:29.279
    | text      = I don't want to get into this, like, you guys are evil for this specific circumstance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:34.799
    | text      = There are so many other ones.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:37.440
    | text      = Like I mentioned, 911 operators got a ton of tips during this time, and one of the more
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = this immediately becomes a huge deal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = This will not be the only time in this story that appropriate data entry skills would have
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
